meanings.definition: The opening in a garment through which the arm passes.
meanings.sent1: She sewed the armhole carefully into the sleeve of the dress.
meanings.sent2: His shirt had a comfortable armhole that allowed easy movement.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten tried to crawl through the armhole of the sweater.
meanings.sent4: The armhole of possibilities opened up when she decided to pursue her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streamed through the armhole, highlighting the intricate stitching.

meanings.definition: A hole or opening in a piece of furniture or equipment for inserting the arm.
meanings.sent1: The recliner had a plush armhole for resting comfortably.
meanings.sent2: He found a hidden compartment with an armhole for storing small items.
meanings.sent3: The armhole in the chair seemed like a secret passage to another world.
meanings.sent4: She reached into the armhole of the sofa and discovered a forgotten toy.
meanings.sent5: The armhole in the desk was designed for easy access to the drawer.
